heading: 7 hot tips to stay fit and healthy.
content: Whether you're at home or travelling abroad, try to embrace these steps and stay healthy.

heading: An hour of moderate exercise a day enough to counter health problems.
content: The health risks associated with sitting for eight or more hours a day can not be neglected.

heading: This No-Gym,HIIT Workout gets the job done veryy quickly.
content: There is a notion out there that you need to belong to a gym in order to maintain your health.

heading: This Foolproof Trick Will Convince You to Work Out Even When You Don’t Want To.
content: Whenever you find yourself low on motivation, or feeling like you’re short on time, she says that this subtle change can make a huge difference.

heading: This 20-Minute Treadmill Workout Builds Speed and Stamina.
content: Got 20 minutes? Then you have just enough time to hop on the treadmill for this high-intensity interval (HIIT) workout from Debora Warner, a running coach and CEO of the Mile High Run Club.

heading: Moderate Alcohol Consumption May Increase Risk Of Atrial Fibrillation.
content: Atrial fibrillation is a known risk factor for stroke and the irregular pumping of blood can lead to clots, which may travel to the brain and cause a stroke.
